scriptedEmail.name: Verify Email Code
scriptedEmail.description: Sends an email validate users email address.
scriptedEmail.bodyScript:
Hi, $context_v1_email.Context.User.DisplayName

You have been sent this email to verify that you own it.

Please click on the link to confirm that this is your email and activate your community account or type in the following code

$context_v1_email.Context.Code
scriptedEmail.languageResources: <language key="en-us"> <resource name="Footer">You were sent this email because an administrator sent it to all members of the {role} role on {site_name}.</resource> <resource name="Header">Email Verification Code</resource> <resource name="Subject">{site_name}: Email Verification Code</resource> </language>
